events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration and processing.
A dedicated recruiter from the Engineering hiring team has been assigned to your application and will guide you through the next steps.
We completed your initial screening and found your experience aligns well with the requirements of the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions and confirming your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for June 5th at 3 PM UTC with our lead software engineer.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The panel appreciated your knowledge of software development and problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for June 8th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company fit and benefits.
Your HR interview went well. Our team noted your enthusiasm and alignment with our company culture.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role. Please review the compensation package and terms sent to your email.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are excited about the possibility of you joining our engineering team.
We are thrilled to confirm that you have accepted the offer to join our engineering department as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome aboard! We are here to support you as you transition into your new role.
The hiring process for your Software Engineer position has been successfully completed. We look forward to your contributions to the team.
